Sentencas: An electrode supported fuel cell concept with DC magnetron sputtered electrolyte films on the fuel electrode has been demonstrated.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: NiO/yttria-zirconia substrates with porosity up to 32% were used for depositing thin films (5-16 mu m) of yttria stabilised zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: By controlling film deposition parameters and surface porosity of the substrate, and by careful annealing of deposited films, highly dense and impervious films of YSZ have been produced.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The annealed electrolyte films as well as cross-sections of half cells before and after reduction of NiO in hydrogen atmosphere have been carefully characterised by scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction studies indicate the presence of a single cubic phase in the annealed film.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The conductivity has been measured by impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: Complete fuel cells have been prepared and evaluated in the temperature range of 700-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: Their current-voltage characteristics have been determined with a current interruption technique.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: Early results on small cells have shown power densities in the vicinity of 600 mW cm(-2) for air/H-2 (2-3% H2O) at 800 degrees C, 440 mW cm(-2) at 750 degrees C and 210 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The preparation of dense and impervious electrolyte films on 50 mm x 50 mm anode supports has been successfully demonstrated.
Titulo: Electrode supported solid oxide fuel cells: Electrolyte films prepared by DC magnetron sputtering
